name: Can’t Handle The Crime And Scandal

episodes.title: 027 TRUE CRIME: Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell- The Crazy Cult Mum And Doomsday Prophet Murders
episodes.description: In this mammoth episode, we explore the disturbing case of Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell. What started as a story about two people with extreme and outrageous beliefs turned into a nightmare when Lori's children, Tylee and JJ, went missing plus multiple suspicious deaths start surrounding the pair. As the investigation unfolds, we look into their crazy ideas surrounding the end of the world and zombie spirits, we delve into a detailed timeline leading up to a very tragic discovery. Thanks for tuning in friends! We release an episode every Monday. Come join us on socials: INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/canthandlepodcast?igsh=em1jZ2duemw4eTlv&utm_source=qr YOUTUBE https://youtu.be/uRG0uLTPd2g?si=NjgEdW7w7hQV2dUT FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/share/su9iNJcC4LQXuyqK/?mibextid=LQQJ4d Contact Canthandlepodcast@gmail.com Sources: https://www.eastidahonews.com/2023/06/the-latest-timeline-in-the-cases-of-lori-vallow-and-chad-daybell-march-2024/ Netflix : Sins If Our Mother Documentary https://www.cbsnews.com/amp/news/lori-vallow-chad-daybell-what-did-they-do-doomsday-mom-murders-case-timeline/ https://www.drphilpodcasts.com/lori-vallow https://www.cbsnews.com/amp/news/lori-vallow-daybell-guilty-idaho-doomsday-mom-unimaginable-crimes-48-hours/ https://news.sky.com/story/amp/sex-money-and-dark-spirits-inside-the-doomsday-murders-trial-that-gripped-millions-13145181 https://youtu.be/5uOqHX10OSA?si=4PpNw-YzbU362Mm https://youtu.be/czXx8V0e5TU?si=a-OdG_zEnT8KVRsa https://www.youtube.com/live/2vhmZP04-Hc?si=COSeT77BNCmdGay5
